mercury.title: Mercury
mercury.desc: Venture to the closest planet to the Sun. With scorching days and freezing nights, it's a world of extremes. Marvel at sunrise and sunset on the same horizon!

venus.title: Venus
venus.desc: Journey to our 'sister planet', shrouded in thick clouds and mysteries. Feel the intense heat and explore its volcanic plains. A mesmerizing hellish beauty.

earth.title: Earth
earth.desc: Discover the blue jewel of our solar system, brimming with diverse landscapes and life. From its blue oceans to green forests, it's a paradise like no other.

mars.title: Mars
mars.desc: Embark on an adventure to the Red Planet. Explore its rugged terrain, giant volcanoes, and deep canyons. Be a pioneer in humanity's quest for life beyond Earth.

jupiter.title: Jupiter
jupiter.desc: Behold the giant of our solar system. With its Great Red Spot and immense storms, its majesty is unparalleled. Float among its 79 moons and experience its magnetic allure.

saturn.title: Saturn
saturn.desc: Witness the planet with golden rings. Float amidst its icy rings and gaze upon its many moons. Saturn's beauty will leave you spellbound.

uranus.title: Uranus
uranus.desc: Venture to the ice giant that lies on its side. With its azure blue color and extreme seasons, it's a world of wonders. Delve into the mysteries of this distant planet.

neptune.title: Neptune
neptune.desc: Journey to the last known planet of our solar system. Dive into its deep blue atmosphere, experience fierce winds and watch its dark storms. Truly, a dreamer's paradise.
